import React from 'react' import Button from '../components/Button'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

Who we are and our Goals

Girls face numerous barriers and societal expectations that have limited their participation and representation in the traditionally male-dominated computer science and engineering fields. We aim to break down these barriers by inspiring and encouraging girls to pursue their interests, ensuring that they have the confidence, skills, and knowledge to thrive in the technology-driven world of today and tomorrow. Through our free resources and engaging opportunities, we hope to ignite a lifelong passion for these fields.

) } export default AboutUs;
